alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 9:21PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Gadsden, Decatur and southeastern Seminole Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 921 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near West Bainbridge, or near Bainbridge, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bainbridge, West Bainbridge, Attapulgus, Brinson, Desser, Hanover, Ausmac, Reynoldsville, Eldorendo, Recovery, Decatur Co A/P, Faceville, Fowlstown, Cyrene and Dogtown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
